Data processing function for panel data (long format)

Source: R/did-data.R
did_data_panelL.Rd

Data processing function for panel data (long format)

did_data_panelL(outcome, treatment, post_treatment, id_subject, id_time,
  Xcov, x_formula = NULL)

Arguments

outcome

A vector of outcome variable.
treatment

A vector of treatment indicator variable.
post_treatment

A vector of numeric time index for post treatment periods.
id_subject

A vector of subject index variable.
id_time

A vector of time index variable.
Xcov

A matrix of covariates.

Value

A list. Each element corresponds to each post-treatment period. Each element of the returned list is also a list consists of the following:

  • Y: outcome vector.

  • D: treatment vector.

  • formula: A list of formula for lm.

  • pdata: A data frame appended transformed outcomes (e.g., yd0, yd1, etc).

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
